thread.title: Lansdowne Hotel to close to become performing arts school
thread.title_full: Lansdowne Hotel to close to become performing arts school

title: Lansdowne Hotel to close to become performing arts school
text:
Lansdowne Hotel to close to become pe... Lansdowne Hotel to close to become performing arts school 2 hrs ago Read more: The Sydney Morning Herald 
Last drinks: the Lansdowne Hotel would become a performing arts school under a development application lodged with the City of Sydney. Photo: Newtown graffiti / Flickr For generations of students, musos and bohemians, the Lansdowne Hotel has been a home away from home - a place to escape class or boredom in favour of cheap drinks, live music and late nights. Start the conversation, or Read more at The Sydney Morning Herald.
